virtual flyBspObject* fire (flyVector &p, flyVector &dir, float v, int playerid, flyBspObject *o=0)
 Fires the missile from the given position with the given direction and velocity.

void init ()
 Members initialisation function, is called upon activating the object.

int step (int dt)
 State update function, is called once per frame, moves the missile, releases sprites and animates them.

void draw ()
 OpenGL drawing function, is called whenever the engine's camera can see the object, draws the missile.

 Message receiving function, is used for communication between objects.

Public Attributes

flyMesh* objmesh
 the missile's mesh.

float rotvel
 the missile's maximum z-axis rotation velocity.

light* l
 light carried with the missile.

float lightzpos
 the relative position of the light over the missile's local z axis.

sound* snd_travel
 sound carried by the missile when flying around.

viewport* viewport
 viewport that renders the missile view on a window.

sprite_light* s
 a sprite released periodically by the projectile when flying.

float sfact
 frequence in which the sprite is released.

hitmark* hm
 hitmark layed on walls by the projectile.

float lookangle
 maximum angle in which a homing missile looks for enemies.

float lookdist
 maximum distance in which a homing missile looks for enemies.

float turnvel
 homing and guided missiles' turning velocity.

followpath* path
 a followpath object that follows the flying missile.

Detailed Description

Missile projectile class.

This class implements a missile fired by missile guns.
